methods.getNotification:
Creates a notification for the table changes.

:param upstream: (io.deephaven.engine.v2.Listener.Update) - The set of upstream table updates.
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.tables.live.NotificationQueue.IndexUpdateNotification) table change notification
methods.onUpdate:
Process notification of table changes.

:param upstream: (io.deephaven.engine.v2.Listener.Update) - The set of upstream table updates.
